DataTransform Class Reference

Detailed Description

Base class for objects that will manipulate data and produce a new set.

For example statistics might be calculated, background might be subtracted, normalization might be performed, or data might be reordered.

virtual bool DataTransform::transformData ( PsBoard &  board,
const DataStore &  in,
DataStore &  out 
) [pure virtual]

Core API.

Take in a blackboard, a data store and output an updated blackboard and possibly modified data store.

Parameters:
board Blackboard state input, to be updated as dictated by transform
in Intensity level data to be transformed
out Any intensity data post transform

Implemented in ChipStreamDataTransform, PmAdjusterTransform, and QuantMethodTransform.
